content.detailedDescription: I was having a cigarette break at work outside the store and talking with a customer when we saw this and recorded a bit on my cell. just saw this object in the sky. it looked odd because it changed directions and looked like something was flipping around it. it ended up disappearing.
content.summary: Odd object flying in the sky and changing directions.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting out side of mothers house with my mother, wife and sister in the country with no light pollution smoking a cigarette. my mother and wife both noticed a star at the same time moving in one direction. the first time it just slowly faded over a 2 mi period heading north bound in the atmosphere or higher. 5 mins later 3 planes in different directions were flying with apparent plane lighting. then 15 minutes after heading south east something that looked the same with single light brightened and dimmed slowly for five  minutes in same direction till dimmed out. neither not had a tail like a comet. we were amazed at this sight knowing for a fact it was not a plane. we lost sight of first one as it faded out completely. not sure if was same object but second sighting it went out of sight beyond the hill in our back yard. still well above normal plane flight altitude. looked as if in space.
content.summary: Appeared like a star in brightness and looks but moved and light  brightened in and out.

content.detailedDescription: It appeared at about 1 a.M. after leaving a casino, other search lights were around but were not as clear as this light was. it was stationary. also it appeared that the rest of it was cloaked, almost rectangular. i've heard about one being reported in the area before, both times on new years eve. there's even videos of it.
content.summary: Stationary object

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch i then saw the object come up in the north west horizon and move south east across the sky at a constant but rate of speed. the object appeared to be about 5000 feet up in elevation. and was huge. it produced a solid red light at first then a white blueish sort of light as it got farther south.
content.summary: First seen in north west horizon moving south east then it changed course and moved dew south. no sound noted. and object appeared to be about 5000 feet up.

content.detailedDescription: Walked down to beach at lake after arriving home after a long day of driving to stretch legs a bit. it was a friday night i think.  could not figure out what i and 3 others were looking at!  the following monday morning, hugh downs of the today show, was talking on tv to an air force officer about ufo events in exeter, nh around the pease air force base area. people there were reporting 100 foot diameter discs with glowing red undersides! this was "the incident at exeter" written by author john g. fuller. the officer explained the events as an air force training excersize.But the sheriff of the police force there proved that the air force was lying. this was an important breach in the governments lying campaign about ufos. this incident had a profound effect on me and changed my view of reality forever even tho' nothing of consequence occurred while observing the phenomena. all i could think of the red lights was that they were on balloons-was 23 years old at the time and never thought about ufos. after a while they just disappeared. i wrote a letter to j. fuller with a drawing describing my experience. he wrote back and thanked me.
content.summary: 4 to 6 red objects hovering on a clear night sky evenly spread out

content.detailedDescription:
At about 9:50 pm august 25 my wife noticed strange lights in the sky. their were several objects 6-10 that hovered in the same general area for approx 5-10 mins. they changes formation a few times and glowed a redish orange or gold color. i did take a few pictures, but the quality is not that good.
the objects also have a cloud of what appeared to be smoke near the lights.
the objects just disappeared after approx 10 mins.

after the event i look on the internet and found a video of a sighting over murrieta dated june 25 2014. the objects in that video looks exactly like the objects we saw last night.
content.summary: Saw several objects that had a very bright red orange or gold hue . we watched them for approx 5-10 min then they disappeared

content.detailedDescription: 7 airmen, ranking from smsgt to sgt (i was a ssgt) were at horseshoe lake on base; the midnight sun was crawling along the eastern horizon (behind us - i was at the top of the earth, lol) i looked up and said "look at the falling star" - all seven of us watched it's very slow lazy descent and within 3-4 seconds it stopped way over head and shot off into oblivion.  there was at that time a missile/rocket test sight called poker flats (i have been there once to watch a launch of a rocket).  none of us ever spoke of it that i know of and this is my first report of a second encounter (ref mufon #59326) it was at no time larger than the head of a pin and vanished past the size of a "." period. we were astounded, speechless and other events also took place that night that are too personal to describe here.  i am now a 110% disabled usaf veteran and am fighting cancer with success.
content.summary: Extreemly bright white blue lazy descent very rapid 25dg ascent
content.locationName: Eielson AFB North Pole, A, Alaska

content.detailedDescription:
And the object had a trail of yellow sparks behind it, i remembered i had binocs glove compartment in my car.As i stood looking i heard a semi-truck pulling off side of road. i glimst the trucker standing beside his rig watching the object too. it was larger now and glowed. i should be running i thought,but as i watched i got this...Feeling not to be affaid. hard to explain,anyway the objects glow dimmed,sort of cooling down,then as my eyes grew accoustomed to the darkness. the object was turning upright and i saw blue like jetflame at  bottom side manuvering left to right. then it hovered about 500ft above me and 70 degrees...It was a capsual shape  like the early astronaughts used only it was maybe 30-50 ft big..Then it tilted and shot off slowly then it was gone.
at first i did'nt think about what just happened,then after a day or two i began talking to other people about the experience,but i felt most did not believe me.
content.summary: At first it appeared to be a star then a glowing light moving then  becoming bigger,it was coming in my direction

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were sitting on my front porch when we saw a bright red-orange light flash and then the neighborhood lights went out. we walked to the yard for a better view of what was going on and directly above us we saw a dark disk shaped object with red-orange lights around the edge that were going off and on in a circular motion.At that time it started to move southward, weaving back and forth until it disapeared in the distance.I was very excited, i had never seen anything like it before and didn't know what to think, then when my brother came home and asked if we had seen it i was more excited because we shared this encounter.I have had 2 other sightings since then and each one is scarier than the previous one i will post those also.
content.summary: We saw a bright orange flash while sitting on the porch.We noticed the neighborhood lights went out an went into the yard for a better view. directly above us we noticed a dark circle with red orange lights going off and on at the edge

content.detailedDescription: I had just pulled into my home and when my fiance and i got out of the car we saw an amber light descend rapidly and then abruptly stop and hover. this object was east of us and a few miles away. i ran to the edge of the property and tried to film the object with my cell phone camera. because it was dark my camera had a hard time focusing on the light and i caught the tail end of the incident. it stayed there for almost two minutes but i only got a few seconds of it before it blinked out. i have seen these types of lights in that same place a few times now. a few months back my fiance and i saw a few pf these objects fly in formation, slowly moving and then blink out in unison.
content.summary: Amber light descended then hovered

content.detailedDescription: There is not one object ther are thousands of object in a small groop but there are many groops. mark mellein i been studying them for a long time but i been finding out that there are so much more now and they are not hard to find any more. black mountain is south east from ojai and its full of them in fact i am worried that how much there is on that mountain and not even 2 miles from down town ojai ca 93023 and 4 miles north is shelf road that i dont go there any more cause the activaty is so much i cant take in the information any more it scares me to know how much is up there......     i know there is a lot of millatary persanal around but it seems to me that know one knows about the ufos or cares/. so i dont know why they havent taken me out yet iv been wateing so i keep on studying....... i thought that if you report ufo activity some one investigate in five 5 years no one has yet this is so important
content.summary: I think we all are in trouble they are everware and they know how not to be seen and yet they are all over

content.detailedDescription: Asleep; bright white beam came through ceiling (over old portable closet) slanting to the floor. i awoke and with large doll in my right hand as i floated up the bright white light through the ceiling.  our home was just 3-4 houses from the original west fence of davis-monthan field (just west of the original red and white checked water tower.  this area is now the zoo, water ponds, park, etc. that was turned over to the city of tucson approx. 1953/54.  that is all i have memory of but it has never left my memory to this day. this was my first encounter, but not my last.  i will fill in another report on my second encounter.
content.summary: I ascended a bright white light through the ceiling of my room

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing on our front porch,when i noticed the ball of light. i have seen them many times but normally at night and not having a camera in hand but this time i finally did so i magnified my camera on my moto x motorola cell phone by 4.0x to catch it on film. we both were trying to get it on film at the same time but i was able to. this is the first time i have seen them during the day our neighbor has also seen these several times. i always watch the sky here at my house i have a thing for the stars and clouds etc.. so my normal is to look up and see what is above and i seen it just above the clouds facing across the street . it had no faa lights on and as it passed it was no plane, or anything i can describe as a object that i would be use to seeing living not far from an air port / base .. it wobbled and the light on it changed colors it had a trace tail but nothing i wouldn't explain away with camera flaring. i watched it for over 2mins as i video-ed it and it finally descended at an angle disappearing behind the trees. we first seen it at 8:26pm est and it disappeared at 8:28pm est.
content.summary: [jd] light/orb this has happen multiple times first time on film

content.detailedDescription:
I live in hamilton ontario on the mountain.  

i was on my deck looking towards the south.  there is a large tree to the right of my backyard (southwest).  from behind the tree about 1 ½ km away, about 1 km above the ground the object first came into my line of vision.

it moved at the speed of a slow moving plane, or helicopter going from south west to south east.  this was no plane or helicopter though.  it was disc shaped and its color was orange/red.  it was difficult to make out its exact shape because there was some kind of vapour effect that surrounded it.  kind of looked like it was on fire.  but no flames were visible.  it just had this bright orangy red glow with a fiery mist that trailed behind it and surrounded it.  at first i thought it must have been a meteor.  but meteors don’t move that slow. 

the object continued at the same speed and headed southwest.  but as it was getting further and more of its back was facing me, its appearance changed.  the orange red colour seemed to fade off and there appeared to be this umbrella-like whiteish swirling vortex that seemed to be coming from the front of the object.  perhaps this vortex was creating its orange red appearance?  

it continued on its way until i could no longer see it.
the whole event lasted only a few minutes.  i do not know what it was i saw.  let me be clear though.  i was not under the influence of drugs or alcohol.  i have always been a believer of ufo’s, aliens etc and have spend 2 decades studying the phenomena.  i have met at least 4 people in my life who are first eye witnesses to ufo encounters.  

i always dreamed of having my own experience.  but let me tell you, now that it has happened, my reaction is not what i thought it would be.  i am deeply bothered by it.  i am trying to be as rational as possible as to what i witnessed.  my description is as accurate as i can make it.  i would like some kind of rational explaination.  is it some kind of military vehicle?  i don’t know.
content.summary: Orange/red disc moving across skies observed from my back yard deck

content.detailedDescription:
On september 4, 2008, i was taking my usual evening bike ride and at around 9:15 pm i observed a low flying craft that i was unable to identify.

the first thing that drew my attention to the craft was the hum of its engine. it was a kind of hum-flutter sound. i have military, law enforcement, and some flight training, so i was more interested in trying to figure out what kind of craft it was when i first looked up and saw it down the street hovering over the trees. 

the aircraft was more or less in a kind of very slow moving hover mode.

the trees where i ride my bike are maybe 50 to 70 feet tall, and 
the craft was maybe another 50 feet or so above the trees. i’m not too good at estimating distances, but to me it was like looking at a school bus maybe a block away. 

the sky was very clear that night, and filled with visible stars, so the craft was very easy to see. i rode my bike until i was directly under it. i was traveling north very slowly on my bike, and the craft was traveling very slowly south  (barely moving in a slow hover mode). 

the craft body was dark and triangular in shape, and had alternating red and white flashing lights evenly spaced about 2 feet apart all around it on all three sides. the nose of the craft had a dished out area that contained a high beam light. i could see the beam reaching up into the night sky. the light seemed to have the ability to turn as if it was searching the sky.

the body of the craft was for the most part just a dark colored area surrounded by the flashing lights. i really couldn’t make out any specific details. while i looked up at the craft i first thought it must be some kind of new helicopter (because it was so low and so slow moving, and the almost familiar flutter sound of the engine), but it was not shaped like any helicopter i had ever seen before, nor like any other aircraft i had ever seen before.

i took my eyes off of the craft for maybe a second or two to turn my bike around (from going north to going south to stay under the craft), and that moment the craft was gone. it was a completely clear night, i could see the stars in all directions, and there was not a single aircraft in the sky. at that moment i was convinced that what i had just seen was no ordinary aircraft. again, it was like looking at a school bus sitting in an open field maybe 100 feet away, and then with a blink your eyes it is completely gone.

i rode my bike around for a while to see if i could spot it again, but no luck. i saw a couple walking together and asked them if they had seen anything unusual in the sky, they said know. 

when i got home i called the local police department (mpd) to inquire if anyone had called in to report seeing anything unusual in the sky. the lady i talked to said no, and asked why. i told her what i had seen and she sounded interested, but i’m sure she probably thought i was a nut…i felt like one just telling her the story.

i also tried to call the local airport control tower, but got a recording that they closed at 9 pm.

the next morning i called the airport control tower again, and was put in contact with the lady who was on duty that night. i told her my story, and asked if she knew of any aircraft that might come close to that description that would fly in our general area? she advised me that there were a few craft in the sky before 9 pm, but nothing at all recorded after 9 pm, and nothing at all at any time traveling north to south. she seemed interested, so we chatted about it for a few minutes. she mentioned that a nearby air force base had a lot of traffic going in and out of it, but i’m not sure what ‘nearby’ air force base she is talking about?


attached is a rough draft of the shape of the craft using my paint shop software, but the corners of the craft were more rounded (not sharp angles as depicted in the drawing. the circle in the front represents the flood light that i saw there.

[name, address, phone number, and email removed/cms/tg]

note: over the next few days i mentioned my experience to a few of my close friends (including my priest), but only my friend '[name removed/cms/tg]' (who i have know for about 40 years) believed me. i told my priest as we were chatting just before giving my confession. he smiled at me and kind of shrugged his shoulders as if to say ‘ok, if you say so’.

since then i have learned that few people are ever going to take such a story seriously. no wonder people are hesitant to share their stories.

as a professional photographer i always have a camera close by, what a time not to have one. a week after the incident i did a lot of research on the best camera to use to take such photos, especially at night. the canon vixia hfg10 seemed to be the best bet, but they retail for $1499.00…i bought one anyway. since then i have hoped to be able to maybe see that craft again so that i can photograph it.

in my opinion the craft i saw was probably something new the military was working on. if it were extraterrestrial, why would they have red and white id marker lights all around it?
content.summary: Spotted a triangular craft with red & white blinking light hovering above the trees.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my east deck, with a cigar and whiskey, enjoying the evening when a saucer shaped object crossed from the west to the east,moving silently and very quickly across my field of vision. 

it was thick on the rim, as though there were a couple of saucers stacked together. it was also quite thick at the center, with a curved shallow dome configuration, top and bottom.

i was struck by the fact that there appeared to be navigation lights flashing around its rim. this led me to think that , perhaps, this was a vehicle built in the usa.

its surface, as i recall, was shiny and silvery in color. 

the object quickly passed my area of observation and passed beyond the trees that form the margin of my area of observation.
 since this is not the first time that i have seen ufos, and not the first time that i have considered the possibility that we are not alone in  the universe. i was somewhat elated to see what appeared to be a ufo. however, since it had flashing lights around its perimeter, i decided that, likely,  i had seen a product built here, on planet earth.
content.summary: Thick saucer, lights circling rim counter-clockwise from my vantage. lights colored. i believe us vehicle.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from the grocery store and as i was driving between 2 farm fields that were half grown and i saw this huge object through the the wo sheiks that was just floating in the air and i knew that the u.S. had nothing that could do what this thing was doing so i got out and took the attached images but as i got out it started to rise and fly off without a sound which is why i blew up the images
content.summary: The craft was larger than a jumbo jet and could not have been a natural phenomenon

content.detailedDescription: I forgot what i was doing or going to but. i needed to go catch a bus i just got done telling my mom i may need to use my ipod to record something today but i let her use my ipod i want to wait for the bus i see a sun like object just about the same height as the trees it was stationary but it also slowly spined twice then it shrinked out of existence and i know this to be a ufo the sun was above head clear blue skies no wind and this thing was northwest at treetop level only then i was mad cause i didn't have my ipod to record it i also felt like making someone come out of the adjacent house to see this thing with me but i didn't want to take my eyes off of it
content.summary: A sun like object shrinked out of existence

content.detailedDescription: At the time i was living in tucson arizona, in a large community called rita ranch.  i had gone to bed around 10pm and just fell asleep immediately. however at 1 am i just woke up with a start and could not fall asleep again.  i got out of bed, got a soda from the fridge and walked out on to my patio.  as i took a sip of the soda i looked up and it was a super clear night and the stars were shining brightly.  however there was a huge area where the stars did not show, also there was a low humming sound and then i saw the lights of the craft.  it was the shape of a triangle with large round white lights on each point of the triangle, then there was a very large round pulsing red light in the center.  i observed in moving very, very slowly over my house and it moved out over the desert.  then it just accelerated and vanished.  i was not able to go back to bed that night, i watched the tv, called the station to see if there was anything and there was no sighting.  this was one of those things that later you wonder if you really saw it! but even now i can still relive the moment.
content.summary: Triangle shaped

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east on i-30 in  west fort worth. as im driving along, i
see something that really catches my eye and sends chills up my spine. i look up and i see a massive, metallic disk-like shape way up in the sky.
i could tell just by looking that the object had to have been hovering at a mad velocity. it was just sitting there. by this time my palms are starting to sweat and it looks like its fading out. fading out like a tv channel with a bad connection. ive simply never seen something like it before. all i have been searching for are answers to what was seen. because if that thing was a ufo then aliens are a reality. but what would these..."things" want from us. when i had my quick 6-10 second experience i had the eerie feeling that they were studying us. seeing the ends and outs of humanity. anyways i hope my testament goes towards something. maybe someone else has seen something similar to the things that i have seen.
content.summary: Massive disk like object that has a distink metallic glow. must be 300 ft across? maybe more. could in no way be conventional to our capabilities

content.detailedDescription:
My husband had gotten up for work. it was unusually clear outside so i decided to step out on the deck from our bedroom to observe the constellations.  i saw the object when i got to the slider. the door and drapes were open about 4 inches. it was a very strange o ject. consistent with the proportion of a hockey puck in height and width 30 to 40 feet across. exactly half glowed red like neon, the other half blue with a row of intensely bright white lights the entire width like a string of pearls. these lights operated independently from each other and appeared to be moving and focusing on different areas, one came to rest on me. so bright i had to close my eyes. as i was standing there watching it my husband came up behind me and asked what i was doing. in my head i'm jumping up and down in excitement yelling ufo ufo! but what came out of my mouth was "lights". my jaw was stiff and i couldn't open it. i couldn't move. i had no control over voluntary movement. i could only stand there. my husband turned around and left the room. the object started moving very slowly then to the north west.  it was moving slowly enough i could have kept up by running. when it crossed past our property into our neighbors it was obscured by their huge cherry tree. there was a huge flash of light and i could move again. i found i was standing at the railing of the deck but couldn't remember walking there. when i realized i had control again i tore down the deck to the kithen and grabbed the camara. the object was at about 500 ft then. i took several pictures making sure i got the corner of the house in the shot for size comparison. from that altitude it became obvious it was delta shaped and the red/blue division was the apex of the triangle. as it was lazily moving forward it was also slowly turning in place. the third edge was completely dark. on its bottom  there were large lights in each corner with 1 light between them on the edge and 1 light directly 8 in the middle. when i took the film in to get it developed i gave them special instructions to print all frames even if they came out dark. when i picked up the pictures the negatives had been cut into pieces with several missing, and there were no printed pictures of
the ufo. later that day i was talking to a friend on the phone about it and made the comment "well no black helicopter" and laughed. a week later i was mowing the back lawn and heard the womp, womp, womp of a helicopter. i turned around and hovering over our house was a black unmarked helicopter.  no insignia what so ever. it was a chinook type. no numbers, no letters side or bottom. it hovered there until it was quite sure i saw it then slowly backed up until it was out of sight. our property was on a steep hill so i was looking up toward the house. this really shook me up. even more than the ufo. we suddenly had trouble getting our mail after living there 10 years. got calls from creditors wanting to know if we'd moved because our mail was returned. received notices saying they had received notices from the post office saying there was a difficulty in delivering our mail. problems with the phone. there was so much weirdness going on the stress was making me feel nuts.
content.summary: First saw a large flat object directly across from the deck. half was red the other blue with a string of intense white lights through the middle like a string of pearls.

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:40pm i took our dogs out to our backyard; there were no clouds in the sky and it wasn't completely dark outside yet. i was looking around while they finished their business and noticed due north, a bright red, very low object traveling slowly due east. it was quite low, which is why it caught my eye. we have a major airport about fifteen minutes away so we see a good number of planes on a regular basis. however, they are all quite high in the sky and they make a slight noise. i first thought perhaps this was an airplane in trouble but it wasn't large enough and i couldn't hear any noise. also, the planes we see follow a north-south route, they don't fly east to west.

i watched it travel east, then it abruptly reversed direction and headed west. at that point it rose higher into the sky, then changed direction again to travel east. i lost sight of it because of large trees in our yard. i had my mobil phone with me and set it on video in case it came back around. it did and i trained my camera on it as it made the same east to west, higher then lower, moves. i was ecstatic that i was filming it, then realized that i hadn't pushed the record button. i have never used the video feature before and didn't know i had to do that. i was able to snap two pictures but you can barely see it and it looks white, not red in the photos.

the entire viewing was about 3-4 minutes and after it turned west again for the last time, it simply disappeared. it looked like its lights just went out. i don't know but i am estimating that it was perhaps a mile or so from our house. the dogs didn't react as it wasn't visible if you weren't standing up looking past our fence and trees.

it was quite unnerving and a bit exciting but i truly did not want it to change directions and move towards our house.  after it disappeared i waited about five minutes to see if it returned but it didn't. i wondered if it could've been some sort of drone but i know nothing about how they operate or if they have lights or are legal in neighborhoods, etc.

over the years, i have seen a few unexplained things in the sky but never have i seen one move like this or stay visible for what felt like a long time. i'm curious if anyone else in southlake or nearby areas saw this object too. (i don't have a 2nd email address so i wrote none.)
content.summary: Red light in sky changing directions and altitudes

content.detailedDescription:
i was standing outside my home chanting (mantra meditation)when i looked up and saw a round bright glowing object moving slowly nw. i called out to my husband to see this ufo and he saw the same thing. the object descends toward us, we looked at it and it look back at us, then  then ascended slowly on a path of direction where i've seen these small ufo for the past three years.

this sounds crazy and i don't know how to write about what i saw but...

this ufo starts to splits into two then back into one. like expanding then back into one ufo. 

i said to my husband, well i told you i've been seeing these ufos, now you  can judge for yourself. he was frighten.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two consecutive days 8/24 & 8/25/14. on the night of the 24th i saw a slow moving. on the 25th at 5:15 pm a bright white glowing object.

content.detailedDescription: Out enjoying the evening with friends when ,a massive object with a light at each end. it came from the south leaving to the west . blocked out 4 or 5 stars at once then snap ,gone, wile trying to find this object again.. a white light came across the sky moving south to north at first sighting of  light faint then over top very bright,possible a mill jet.. ?, it pulsed across the sky, zip, then slow, zip, then slow.. a pinkish colored blast engulfed the back and it to was gone. .First object, seemed brown and black and cigar shaped.The second seemed like a fighter jet but small no real color or mass seen on or around this object . neither made any sounds before, dearing or after sightings. no burst buzzing,nothing ... sunday evening,23rd august 2014 .Zebulon ga, seen by 3 people 2 men 1 female. some clouds around the edges like a circle .No rain. no other craft in area seen nor heard.  we were in the swimming pool as we had no recording devices available .Only seen moving across the sky .We were just talking about the stars when the female said look what is that .Soon after me and my friend began saying, look what is that and the above transpired.  the whole of the event lasted 4 or 5 minutes .
content.summary: Out enjoying the evening with friends when ,a massive object with a light at each end. it came from the south leaving to the west . blocked out 4 or 5 stars. a white light came across the sky

content.detailedDescription: In july of 1978 while on summer vacation in minnesota at the age of 13, myself brother 14,sister 16,two cousins age 16 and 17 and one of their friends a boy unknown age were out for the evening.  after bowling at the local bowling alley we were on our way home. while driving in this rural area we noticed an object in the sky moving back and forth up and down. we pulled over near a open field and the object came down directly over us about 15 feet hovering over us at a slight tilt. bright lights it happened very fast. i was in front of the truck with my cousin driving and my sister. it was very windy and my brother was in the back and yelled "lets get the bleep out of here." we were in shock and just stared. then it left as quickly as it came down. we drove off and tried to follow it. we were screaming out the windows to get attention ufo. when we arrived back at my cousins house we were so flustered and were all trying to tell the story to my parents and aunt and uncle.  i am 49 years old and have told this story many times. we still talk about when we get ttogether. i'm watching history channel now and felt it was time to tell someone who really knows something about it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Noticed at a distance tgen it noticed us came out of sky hovering over our vehicle at tge height of  a  tree

content.detailedDescription: Notice a strange light that hovered for a quick moment blink then blink away. about 30 seconds into video.
content.summary: Usual image in mobile video during filming news helicopters

content.detailedDescription: This happened back in 1994.My girlfriend at the time and i were babysitting for her uncle at his house in knightsen ca,just past oakley.Around 1:00 am,everyone was sleeping,i got bored and decided to go to pittsburg and pick up a friend and show him this house,it was a mansion,with an equestrian center in backyard.I pick up my friend,and it's about a 30 min ride there and back,so,we get into knightsen,and it's a long straight road,about a mile long,and all of a sudden right in the middle of the road,in front of us,these red lights flashed across the road,back and forth,like it was a train crossing,but no bells or train,i'm heading straight at it and it's coming no closer,and i'm really nervous,going faster and can't catch up to it.Then it's gone,my friend said,did you see that,yes,i had to pull over he was getting car sick.So we get back in the car,and headed for the house.Long story short,when i was driving,we kept passing this catfish pond,i found this payphone and called the house,told my girlfriend i can't find the house,she asked.Where i was,i said post office,she said i was right around the corner,and i look up and i see the bright lights from the equestrian center.We finally get to the house at 5:30 am,from 1:00 am.That's a 4hr time loss.
content.summary: No craft seen,just lights flashing across road like a train crossing,blinking right to left,and time loss

content.detailedDescription: I recorded the object hovering for 4 minutes then an airplane came by and the object disappeared and reappeared over and around the airplane. then the object turned a bright red and yellow color. changed directions up and down left and right and then shot off at high speeds. i have it all on video.
content.summary: The bright object chased an airplane

content.detailedDescription: We were fishing and camping on lake champlain. 2.I was looking at stars,beautiful clear night. 3.I had no idea, called my friends to come see.Had just heard of jfk jr plane crash on radio.  4. the triangle went north over lake towards plattsburg, no sound ,very large,blocked out stars as it passe seemed almost leisurely as it passed. then sometime later it returned south. this time there were very fast lighted objects from above and below, reminded me of bees at a hive!The triangle mod slowly? south while the bright small objects darted in and out? with incredible speed and off into space 5. i was amazed ,as were my friends and their son. 6. we lost sight as it continued south toward whitehall
content.summary: Saw large trianglular object and smaller objects interacting with it

content.detailedDescription:
Main encounter: july 2007
i was on my way home from a friends house. it was early summer night. i was approaching the intersection near my home and noticed bright lights up ahead near the gas station. i first believed it was a plane or helicopter and thought that it was strange for anything to be that low to the ground and since it was not moving i thought helicopter, and on second thought i thought the gas station might have been doing construction on their roof. i pulled up to the light and realized it was not a helicopter or construction. i looked at the clock, it was 12:03 and i immediately turned off the radio and air condition and rolled my windows down to get a better view. i grabbed for my phone immediately to take a photo and it would not work i attempted to power it back on, when just a few minutes prior i had full battery and the phone was operational. the thought in my head was this is a million dollar photo and i have to get it! it was off. dead. i was freaking out and looked around the intersection to see if other cars were around to take notice. nobody was around. my light was red so i hung out of my window in awe. the craft was triangular with 3 white dishes of the purest most brightest  beautiful white light i have ever seen. the light appeared to be contained within the dishes and there was no sign of illumination below or around it. the triangular shape of the 3 dishes if on an airplane would signify that the craft was facing east. i was heading south. the white dishes that glowed appeared to be what quartz crystal looks like when it is activated by frequency. glowing, bright within itself. the three large dishes took up a lot of the bottom side of the craft and in the center of the 3 lights was a tiny blinking red light. i noticed the craft was made out of some non reflective black metal or so it appeared and there was detailed engraving like lines on it. i was more focused on the lights. the creepy thing about this whole experience was that the craft was silent. you could hear the summer breeze and nothing else. the sound must have been out my hearing range. keep in mind the craft was so low to the roof of the gas station that if you were at the gas station and looked up you would not have seen it.

my light turns green. nobody is around so i begin to idle through the light still hanging out of my window watching in shock. moving at about 3 mile an hour i get half way through the intersection when the craft begins to move what appears to be backwards, along the road with me at about 5 feet above the telephone wires. now i am more scared. freaking out, i know my house street is a few hundred feet ahead on the right. i contemplate turning home or keep going. i was so scared that there was a possibility that i might not return so i decide not to chance it. still to this day i wish i would have. they were obviously aware of me. so myself and the craft are moving slowly down the main road and i reach my street where i turn on praying i can see it from my driveway. i turn and the craft keeps going. i am home and shaking. i cut the power to my vehicle and every light on my dashboard illuminates. not realizing what was going on with it i jump out of the car and look into the sky to see if i can see it. my headlights remain on. i run inside nervous, panicked and scared and my folks are asleep. i run upstairs to my room and to calm myself down i turn the television on for background noise so i can collect my thoughts on what the hell just had happened. this is eery. possibly a coincidence i think otherwise. the television is on nick at nite and home improvement is on. tim is out back talking to his neighbor. the first noise that comes out of the television when i turned it on was "so tim, you're telling me you saw a ufo". right there did me in. i shut the tv off and tried to go to sleep.

the next morning i tried calling some friends to let them know what had happened. my phone would not call out. the whole rest of the weekend i could not call out nor could i receive any calls in. i ended up taking my phone to the dealer and they said that it was fried and i had to purchase a brand new one. also, that weekend i had to jump my car every time i was going to use it. never once before had to do that because it was fairly new and in great condition and now in one weekend i had to jump it about 26 times. my father and i took it to the shop monday and they explained that all of the electrical boards and sensors were fried and had to be replaced. 

between the television, my phone, my car, and the actual experience i am a true believer of ufos and aliens. also, for a while i was obsessed with getting answers for what had happened to me for some type of closure and some of my research led me to find out that the time "12:03" has symbolism meaning of an "encounter" strange to me i thought. and it is obvious that they do emit emp from my electrical failures.

encounter 2: august, 2007
also, that same summer around 3am, i witnessed a small maybe 4.5 foot creature that was solid snow white and naked jump from a bush to my roof landing in a crouching position where it glared down on me with a snow white owl face. i immediately vacated the premises. keep in mind this is a two story home. so one quick blurry leap at about 30 feet with ease. i prayed that it was an owl and my vision was playing tricks on me, but when i googled white owls they were much smaller than what i saw. my neighbor was with me but the noise of the bush rustling scared her because it was about 12 feet away from us and she never looked to see what it was. i wish she had.

encounter 3: november 2007
another encounter had witnesses. it was thanksgiving and a few of my family members noticed white orbs in the back yard. i thought it was car lights reflecting off of the the neighbors windows. my curiosity got me, and i ran outside into the backyard through the snow and the orbs were not near the window, but were in the middle of the yard about 5 feet off of the ground. as i got outside, there was about 6-7 white orbs and they were dancing around each other and one by one, they dissolved and disappeared before i could get a photo. there was about 4 witnesses on this encounter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw lights, got closer, craft was sitting above gas station. started to follow me. telephone wire high.
